sentences: Music is an art form and <<||>> activity whose medium is sound and silence. The common elements of music are: <<||>> ,which governs melody and harmony, rhythm and its associated concepts tempo, meter, and articulation, <<||>> - loudness and softness, and the sonic qualities of timbre and texture, which are sometimes termed the <<||>> of a musical sound. Different styles or types of music may <<||>>, de-emphasize or omit some of these elements.
